do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: Yes, and I am the only editor/administrator of my wiki(s)
putting it all together, what value does: a good tool for everyday life
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...);I have written custom HTML;I have written custom CSS styles;I have written custom JavaScript
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki through web browser with Download Saver (default saving mechanism)
outside of plugins, palettes and other i:
I use the empty edition of TW.

I would like it to be as streamlined as possible.
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: I really like when the community takes their time to choose the developments that will improve TW.
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
I don't think I will leave TW. At worst, I will use older versions.

I'm afraid that it may no longer be open source and that it will lose its basic idea: a simple file that opens on any device. For example, I have already managed to open it on my watch.

I find that the community is good.

To contribute more, we would need questionnaires of this kind. I think it's very good. Also, creating topics for reflection that would focus the participants on a single specific aspect of the TW.
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
